trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for property tabs.
The PropertyTab class provides the base class behavior for a property tab.

Property tabs are displayed on the toolbar of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control of the Properties window, and allow a component to display different views of its properties or other data.
User code will usually not create an instance of a PropertyTab directly.

Instead, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute> that indicates the type of the property tab or property tabs to display for a component can be associated with the properties or types that the PropertyTab should be displayed for.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> will instantiate a PropertyTab of the type specified by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute> associated with the type or property field of the component that is being browsed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> class.
Gets the bitmap that is displayed for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> to display for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> can display properties for the specified component.
The object to test.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object can be extended; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the array of components the property tab is associated with.
The array of components the property tab is associated with.
Releases all the resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>.
Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>.
The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> in an unusable state.

After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> was occupying.
For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> object's `Finalize` method.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.

Allows a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
Gets the default property of the specified component.
The component to retrieve the default property of.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that represents the default property.
Gets the properties of the specified component.
The component to retrieve the properties of.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the properties of the component.
Gets the properties of the specified component that match the specified attributes.
The component to retrieve properties from.
An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that indicates the attributes of the properties to retrieve.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the properties.
Gets the properties of the specified component that match the specified attributes and context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context to retrieve properties from.
The component to retrieve properties from.
An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that indicates the attributes of the properties to retrieve.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the properties matching the specified context and attributes.
Gets the Help keyword that is to be associated with this tab.
By default, this is set to the tab name.
The Help keyword to be associated with this tab.
Gets the name for the property tab.
The name for the property tab.
